description: Purchase of Office chairs for Transport Canada
tags: CETA (Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement) new
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
T8082-220238: Office Chairs

## Introduction
Public Services and Procurement Canada, acting on behalf of Transport Canada, has published a tender announcement for the procurement of office chairs to be delivered and installed in Ottawa by March 31, 2023.

## Tender Details
* **Reference Number**: WS3824782395-Doc3836831428
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3824782395
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 7, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 15, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2023
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

## Tender Description
The tender requires the provision of office chairs, including delivery and installation, to meet the requirements of Transport Canada. The Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments can be accessed and downloaded only after registering or logging into the SAP Ariba account.

## Important Links
[Note: I will add the links here once confirmed]

## Contact Information
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person**: Siddharth Bucktowar
* **Contact Email**: [siddharth.bucktowar@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:siddharth.bucktowar@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone**: None
* **Contact Fax**: None

## Additional Details
* **Trade Agreements**: This tender is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, and others.
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Language
This tender is available in both English and French.
